edu.ucla.sspace.index

Class WindowedPermutationFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.index.WindowedPermutationFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermutationFunction<Vector>

    public class WindowedPermutationFunction
extends Object
implements PermutationFunction<Vector>
    A permutation function that provides windows of positions which are permuted using the same function. For instance, with a window size of 2, words 1 and 2 positions away will be permuted once, words 3 and 4 positions away will be permuted twice, etc. This class supports the following properties:
    Property:
    Default: "1"
    This variable sets the size of a permutation window.

    Author:
    Keith Stevens

        public Vector permute(Vector v,

        Permutes the provided TernaryVector the specified number of times.
        Specified by:
        permute in interface PermutationFunction<Vector>
        Parameters:
        v - an index vector to permute
